thread.title: John Fotias
thread.title_full: Nelson Alexander reviewed by John Fotias

author: John Fotias
title: John Fotias
text: Nikolas is very professional, meticulous and extremely methodical in what he does. He leaves no stone unturned to ensure that the Landlord (myself) and Tenants have excellent communication and that ALL matters are attended to. He is quick and efficient to answer calls and or emails that I have sent to him. For example, Nikolas has attained 4 Quote: s and has actioned one of them on my behalf all within 5 days! He has proven that he is more than capable of handling my 4 properties and thus I am extremely pleased that Nikolas is my agent. I recently chose Nikolas for my property in Carlton and I knew that he could get the job done. If Nikolas were to leave Nelson Alexander then I will definitely move all my properties to his next venture!
